mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ticket_purchases WHERE phone = #{phone} ORDER BY upd_date DESC, board_no DESC

SELECT t.ticket_no, t.board_no, l.title, l.live_date, t.reservation_no, t.name, t.phone, t.upd_date, t.refund FROM live_board l JOIN ticket_purchases t ON l.board_no = t.board_no WHERE l.username = #{username} ORDER BY t.upd_date DESC, t.ticket_no DESC
SELECT * FROM ticket_purchases WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY upd_date DESC, ticket_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticket_purchases( ticket_no, board_no, reservation_no, name, phone, refund ) VALUES ( #{ticketNo}, #{boardNo}, #{reservationNo}, #{name}, #{phone}, 0 )
